text: Bryan Patrick Fentonhttps://www.defense.gov/Our- Story/Biographies/Biography/Article/2061848/bryan-p-fenton/ (born 1965) is a lieutenant general in the United States Army, who serves as the senior military advisor to Secretary of Defense Mark Esper.https://www.dvidshub.net/image/5779650/26th-marine-expeditionary-unit- hosts-us-secretary-defense He previously served as the deputy commander of United States Indo-Pacific Command.
